recommendations.name: Andy Cvitanov
recommendations.subtitle: Advisor, Board Member, Consultant, Retired C Suite Executive
recommendations.description:
Andy is one of those rare business executives and leaders you come across every once in a while. He took a "mediocre" business unit to #1 in the company in a very short period of time. Andy has the ability to not only see the "big picture" and drive organizational results - he has the ability to go one-on-one and listen - deeply to pull out one or two things you said and give you one of these "ah-ha" moments ("how did I overlook that?" kind of thing). When he interacts with you - you became totally energized and you can't help but feel you're part of an organization that wants and will be the BEST in the industry. 

Andy has a very strong executive presence and an ability to get clients to become part of the team. Andy has a sense of humor, can challenge you to do/become even better, never quite satisfied, is super smart and is mission oriented/driven. His team would go through walls for Andy and still will.

Joe Murphy

headline: AI ML Cloud Solutions Architect | Director of AI/ML and Cloud Services | Presales Engineer | Leading Multi-Cloud Solutions with AI/ML | Security+ | AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional | AZURE | US Navy Veteran
about:
A Technology leader and enterprise AI strategist with 15+ years pioneering artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions for Fortune 500 companies and government agencies, specializing in translating cutting-edge AI technology into measurable business outcomes. Lead architect creating AI Centers of Excellence, establishing responsible AI governance frameworks, and lead cross-functional teams of data scientists and ML engineers who deliver production-grade systems that drive revenue growth, operational efficiency, and competitive advantage.

AI areas of expertise:
•AI Strategy & Business Transformation: Led enterprise AI modernization initiatives generating $1.2M+ annual cost savings, 22% operational efficiency improvements, and $4M+ in new contract wins
•Generative AI & LLM Innovation: Pioneer in deploying GPT-4, Claude, custom LLMs, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for customer-facing AI copilots, intelligent automation, and domain-specific applications
•Responsible AI Governance: Architect comprehensive AI ethics and compliance frameworks (HIPAA, GDPR, FedRAMP, SOC 2) that reduced risk incidents by 40% while accelerating AI adoption across regulated industries
•MLOps Excellence: Build scalable ML platforms processing 10M+ records monthly with 99.9% uptime, reducing model deployment time by 60% and incident resolution by 75%
•AI Center of Excellence Leadership: Established and led teams of 15+ data scientists, ML engineers, and cloud architects delivering 50+ production AI solutions across healthcare, finance, government, and technology sectors

Key Achievements:
•Won $4M+ in enterprise contracts through AI innovation leadership and executive briefings
•Reduced AI deployment cycles by 60% through MLOps best practices and cloud-native architecture
•Improved operational efficiency by 22% via AI-enabled business intelligence and predictive analytics
•Generated $1.2M+ annual savings through intelligent automation and AI-driven optimization
•Achieved 92% conversion rate on Fortune 1000 AI proof-of-concepts and technical demonstrations
•Maintained SECRET security clearance leading AI implementations for defense and government

Platform and Technical Expertise:
Multi-Cloud AI Platforms (Azure ML, AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI) | Generative AI & LLMs (OpenAI GPT-4, Claude, Custom Models) | Natural Language Processing | Computer Vision | MLOps & Model Deployment | Responsible AI Frameworks | Enterprise AI Architecture | Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch | Data Engineering & Analytics

experiences.title: Director of AI/ML & Cloud Services
experiences.jobDescription:
Lead enterprise AI strategy for IT consulting firm, delivering production-grade AI/ML solutions for 50+ Fortune 500 and government clients across healthcare, finance, education, and defense.

•AI Strategy & Innovation: Established AI Center of Excellence managing 15+ data scientists, ML engineers, and cloud architects. Pioneer generative AI integration (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini) and RAG architectures for customer-facing copilots and virtual assistants.
•Responsible AI & MLOps: Built comprehensive governance framework ensuring FERPA, HIPAA, GDPR, SOC 2, and FedRAMP compliance. Operationalized cross-cloud ML platforms processing 10M+ records monthly with 99.9% uptime across AWS, Azure, and GCP.
•Revenue Growth: Drive AI innovation reviews and executive briefings, securing $10M+ in enterprise contracts through strategic client relationships.

Key Achievements:

•Generated $1.2M+ annual cost savings through AI-driven optimization.
•Won $4M+ in enterprise contracts via AI innovation leadership.
•Reduced model deployment time by 60% and incident resolution 75%.
•Led 50+ successful AI implementations across multiple sectors.

experiences.title: Senior Engineering Manager | AI/ML Solutions Architect
experiences.jobDescription:
•Led enterprise AI/ML architecture and machine learning platform development for Fortune 500 clients. Directed scalable framework design, generative AI integrations, and MLOps infrastructure.
•Platform Architecture: Developed Onyx—scalable AI/ML framework deployed across AWS SageMaker, Azure ML, and GCP Vertex AI—optimizing data retrieval for 10M+ records monthly.
•Generative AI & Pre-Sales: Integrated GPT-3.5/4 with RAG architectures for AI copilots, securing $2.5M in customer renewals. Served as principal AI engineer in executive briefings and RFP responses.
•MLOps Leadership: Defined AI infrastructure policies across 20+ concurrent projects, implementing comprehensive observability frameworks.

Key Achievements:
•Shortened sales cycles 40% and influenced $2.5M+ in new ARR.
•Reduced ML incident resolution time 75%.
•Achieved 99.9% uptime for AI platform processing 10M+ monthly records.
•Delivered 25% improvement in model quality and deployment efficiency.

experiences.title: Engineering Team Lead | AI/ML Solutions Architect | SECRET Clearance
experiences.jobDescription:
•Pioneered AI/ML adoption for mission-critical military applications. Led data science initiatives and established secure AI frameworks for classified defense operations.
•Defense AI Strategy: Delivered cloud-agnostic AI architectures for classified applications, completing 6 enterprise AI conversions. Designed AI-readiness assessment frameworks for ML maturity and compliance risk.
•Secure ML Implementation: Maintained SECRET clearance while implementing automated ML pipelines using TensorFlow, Keras, and scikit-learn for predictive maintenance and threat detection.
•Team Leadership: Boosted data science productivity 40% implementing Agile/SCRUM methodologies. Mentored 10+ junior engineers in ML development.

Key Achievements:
•Achieved 92% conversion rate for Fortune 1000 defense prospects.
•Reduced ML deployment cycles by 40% through automation.
•Increased operational efficiency by 35% via Agile practices.
•Delivered 15+ automated ML pipelines using Jenkins and MLFlow.

OWASP (Open Web Application Security Project) is an worldwide not-for-profit charitable organization providing unbiased and practical, cost-effective information about computer and Internet applications. The main goal of OWASP is to improve the security of software.

Toastmasters International (TI) is a US-headquartered nonprofit educational organization that operates clubs worldwide for the purpose of helping people develop communication, public speaking, and leadership skills.

ALLIANCE FRANÇAISE of AUSTIN  is a self-financed non-profit organization. The mission of Alliance Française of Austin is to encourage the study and appreciation of French language and Francophone cultures, and to promote and share the language and cultures of the French-speaking world in Austin.

headline: Chief Executive Officer @ Global Pharma Tek | Management Consulting | IT Management
about:
As Chief Executive Officer of Global Pharma Tek for over 14 years, I lead strategic planning, business development, and operational management to enhance our pharmaceutical services across global markets. Our expertise spans drug discovery, clinical trials, regulatory affairs, intellectual property rights, and healthcare IT, with a presence in Canada, the UK, Germany, UAE, and India.  

Focused on outsourcing, benefits negotiation, and talent acquisition, I work to deliver innovative solutions tailored to industry needs. Collaborating with a dedicated team, I strive to maintain robust standards, achieve key milestones, and expand Global Pharma Tek's impact on healthcare and drug development worldwide.

experiences.title: Chief Executive Officer
experiences.jobDescription:
Global Pharma Tek, LLC is a fast-growing Pharmaceutical Services company headquartered in Edison, NJ US with nearshore offices in Canada, the UK, Germany, UAE and India. Our company has strong expertise in Drug Discovery, Clinical Trails, Drug Delivery, Regulatory Affairs, Intellectual Property Rights, Healthcare IT and Consulting Services. 

As the CEO, I'm responsible for successful planning, delivery & management of business strategies and new business development activities, team selection, milestone achievements and establishing robust standards.

headline: Operator → Modern Founder | I help Directors & VPs extract their “invisible genius” into a premium advisory business | Zero to validated in 10 weeks | Ex-Oracle, Workday, HP | 115+ Clients served
about:
On paper, you’ve won.

You have the Director or VP title. You have the stock options. You have the respect of your peers.

But let’s be honest about the cost.

You're trading your life for a paycheck. 
You're answering emails at dinner. 
You're squeezing your "real life" into two days a weekend.

You're rich in money, but you're poor in time.

I know this because I lived it.

I spent 25 years leading $150M+ sales teams for Oracle, HP, and Workday. 
I had the 100K bonuses and stock options. The "perfect" career.

But I realized I didn't own my success. I rented it.

So I left.

I didn't retire. I just changed the business model. 
I stopped selling my time to a corporation and started selling my wisdom to the market.

Now, I live a dual life between Europe and North Carolina. I work on my terms. 
And I help high-performing leaders (VPs, Directors, CxOs) do exactly the same.

Your experience is an asset.

But right now, you are selling it at a discount.

I help you fix that. We build your exit on three pillars:

📌 The Exit: How to leave your role without losing your income level.
📌 The Offer: How to package 20 years of experience into a 5-figure advisory retainer.
📌 The Life: How to build a business that supports your life with more free time, meaningful work, family and friends, moving your body, travel, or pursing hobbies.

You don't need to start over. You just need to package what you already know.

My Background:

- Ex-SaaS Sales Director (Oracle, HP, Workday)
- Italian-American dual citizen (Living the lifestyle I teach)
- Guided 115+ leaders to freedom

👇 Ready to own your time? 

Check the Featured Section.

recommendationsReceived.subtitle: I help high-performing men 40+ get their edge and direction back without blowing up the life they’ve built. In 90 days.
recommendationsReceived.context: Curt was Melina's client
recommendationsReceived.description:
I had just spent over $20,000 on a business coach who left me in worse shape financially than where I was at before I started with him...WTF? Nobody hires a business coach for that! That's like having diabetes and the doctor prescribes Twinkies. So, I was hesitant to spend even more money, yet, I knew something was "off" in my coaching business that needed to be addressed. I wasn't consistently generating revenue, and I felt wishy washy inside, unsure of how to position myself and niche down. I was torn by whether I should be a career coach or a life coach.
One day on a call Melina spotted it and said, "Curt, you know you really light up when you talk about the life and mindset stuff." 
That is what I was feeling, but couldn't quite name it. 
Where Melina helped me that the other coaches did not is getting deeper down, finding those hidden "things" that hold us back.  Or, to put it another way, she helped me peel back the layers of the onion completely. 
Now, I feel more confident and secure in everything from my positioning, niche, sales, well, everything.  She gave me those missing pieces that nobody else could. 
I highly recommend Melina, and would hire her again. Put it this way, I stayed on for an additional two months if that says anything.
Curt Sassak
Former chef turned life and career strategist

I would recommend this program as it has provided me with the new tools, guidance, and support needed to unlock my full potential. recommendations.name: Nick Broekema
recommendations.subtitle: Learn how to attract your ideal audience in my Content Design Cohort | Waitlist on my profile | Kick-off January 27th
recommendations.description:
I came to Nick because his design and brand consistently stood out to me.  I liked his personality, his writing, and of course his style--it's simple, creative, and very effective. 

Before working with him, I pieced together my brand.  My business was growing from almost nothing, mostly through outbound, and I wanted a professional and personal brand that reflected more of who I was, how I could help, and attract more of my ICP inbound.

He was booked when I reached out in the fall of 2023, but in January 2024 he had a spot available that I quickly booked without hesitation. We started working together in February. 

I really enjoyed his approach. He took the time to learn about me, explain things, what I wanted to represent, who my ideal clients were, and my goals.  He even went above and beyond our initial engagement to help me with my writing and positioning.  

He wanted me to WIN. 

What he delivered was nothing short of remarkable.  I loved every single thing--my banner, featured, and content assets. You're seeing it all now on my profile!  Even 3 months later, I'm still creating content using all of the branding elements he provided, and I want more!

The results speak for themselves:

-I grew 4,000 followers in 2.5 months
-I started attracting inbound leads from my ICP
-I increased my prices, and working on my first group offer

If you're on the fence about hiring him, time to jump off and go for it already.  You'll see the results in your business and personal brand immediately--and better than you ever imagined.

I love what Nick has done for me, and I'd hire him again in a second for anything to do with branding and content design. 

And the bonus? He's an amazing person inside and out who's become a friend. 

Thank you so much Nick!

headline: Founder, Canopus Consultancy | Automation Strategist for Finance Operations | Designing Scalable Systems for Growth-Ready Companies
jobTitle: Finance Consultant - Process improvement, SAP Implementation
about:
Manual finance processes don’t just slow teams down, they quietly drain time, decision making quality, and profitability. Most companies only realize it when growth starts exposing the cracks.

I help decision makers uncover the process inefficiencies they’ve normalized and replace them with streamlined workflows and automation built to scale with the business, not complicate it.

Over 25+ years working across India, the Caribbean, Latin America, and Europe, I’ve seen firsthand why automation succeeds or fails. It’s rarely about the tools. It’s about understanding where processes break, who owns the work, and how operational design either strengthens or strangles growth.

My focus isn’t building complexity. It’s eliminating it and turning fragile, manual finance workflows into durable, scalable processes that companies can rely on.

If you're looking to scale smarter (not harder) and want processes built for real growth, I’m always open to a conversation.

experiences.title: Finance Consultant - Process improvement, SAP Implementation
experiences.jobDescription:
U.S. Company with Operations across Latin America and the Caribbean

Manage financial forecasting and analysis for direct labor ($160M) and technology ($40M), overseeing over one-third of the total budget to ensure accuracy, efficiency, and alignment with corporate strategy.
❖  Drive high-impact initiatives to enhance data analysis and reporting, reducing turnaround time by 20%, streamlining workflows, and improving forecast reliability for executive decision-making.
❖  Support OPEX reduction efforts for $40m by tracking and reporting cost-saving initiatives, ensuring visibility and alignment with financial objectives.
❖  Navigate resource constraints within a lean team by implementing innovative forecasting solutions and process improvements, minimizing manual effort and accelerating financial insights to support strategic planning.

Spearheaded a strategic initiative to optimize $2 billion in operational expenses across Latin America and the Caribbean using Anaplan, streamlining processes, and aligning entities on a unified platform.
❖ Unified ~20 company entities on Anaplan, a standardized platform, for a holistic view of operational expense.
❖ Introduced comprehensive visibility into vendor costs and operational expenditures, enabling data-driven insights that improved cost control, enhanced budget accuracy, and strengthened vendor negotiations
❖ Supported the deployment of a centralized cost analysis framework, now leveraged for contract evaluations, improving financial oversight and decision-making.

Led the implementation of a workforce management system, resulting in a saving of 100’s of man hours on a weekly basis and a significant reduction in capital expenditure while improving customer satisfaction
❖	Implemented a Workforce Management (WFM) tool to optimize dispatch, scheduling, productivity and tracking of installation and repair technicians

experiences.title: Senior Manager Fixed Asset and Project Accounting
experiences.jobDescription:
I was hired to plan, establish, and lead the Fixed Assets and Project Accounting department within Global Business Services, including SAP HANA implementation activities and SOX requirements.
 
I led a team of 10, that managed day-to-day operational work, monthly financial reporting behind notable capital expenditure projects, and substantial fixed assets across 45 different legal entities. I scaled team from scratch and matured capabilities in SAP HANA, capital expenditure project accounting, fixed assets process, and stakeholder management of ~150 project managers and country finance teams. Among my achievements:

❖Led the implementation and subsequent global back-office services for SAP HANA implementation for capital expenditure projects and fixed assets.

❖Migrated 45+ legal entities into SAP HANA over a period of 2 years

❖Generated breakthrough savings of 1500+ hours by automating project creation, tracking, and asset capitalization process across 45+ separate legal entities.

❖Used Robotics within SAP HANA to create assets and settlement rules.

experiences.title: Manager Finance Transformation
experiences.jobDescription:
I led the transformation practice in the Finance department. I implemented solutions to expedite work processes and reduce workload, including Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, Financial Planning and Analysis, and credit collections areas. Past successes:

❖Conceptualized and implemented a custom tool to collect credit from Government, saving of ~750 hours per month.

❖Identified opportunities for ~$1M per annum cost savings through completing an analysis of stores footprint and economics.

❖Enabled at least 2 hours of time savings daily (25% time savings) through the implementation of robotics within bank reconciliations.

experiences.title: Consultant, New Build Reporting
experiences.jobDescription:
I functioned as an integral member of the Report & Insight team to overhaul the reporting process for 14 countries as part of a $5B cable network expansion project, reporting to the VP of Network Access Expansion. I researched and identified reporting criteria, aligned definitions, and pursued buy-in from other countries. I instituted a monthly process for collecting data, as well as validating and collating data submitted by other countries, leveraging advanced Excel skills to prepare detailed reports. I am proud to have:
 
❖Created a database of Network Expansion Construction data that enabled a deeper analysis using advanced Excel for data associated with each project in each country by month (vs. budget and forecast) 

❖Delivered the 2017 and 2018 budget deck to the group CEO and his management team for New Build. Coordinated with multiple stakeholders, including Finance, Capital Management, and Operational Excellence teams.

headline: Substack ghostwriting for consultants & executive coaches. VP @ InMarket | Founder @ Second Voice | 13+ years in Agency & AdTech | Audience building + email marketing tips 🧩
about:
Hey! I'm Aldis.

I create premium lead magnets and email funnels for fractional execs and executive coaches under $200K in revenue.

My focus: turning your LinkedIn audience into paying clients through proven, automated email systems.

At Second Voice, we use what I call the LinkedIn-to-List Method:

1) LinkedIn builds your audience
2) Lead magnets capture interested prospects
3) Email funnels convert them to clients

This 3-step approach means you're not just collecting followers - you're building a lead-driving engine that works 24/7.

It's your knowledge, packaged to build and nurture trust on autopilot.

How did I learn this? 

I built my personal brand the only way - posting daily on LinkedIn for months...getting likes but booking nothing. 

Then I discovered email and lead magnets.

I applied my Advertising and Tech background to systemize it. 

Now prospects come pre-sold.

I started Second Voice to build these systems for others.

The reality: High-ticket services need 15-20 touchpoints to convert.

The LinkedIn-to-List Method delivers them automatically while you focus on coaching and running the business.

Book a consultation. 

We'll map out your entire email funnel for you.

Her knowledge and experience in social media alone would make her a tremendous asset. recommendations.subtitle: Marketing Communications Manager at Standard Motor Products
recommendations.description: Stephanie is an exceptional storyteller, with a unique and identifiable writing style. However, she is also a gifted manipulator of words, able to adapt to various forms of writing. But it is her thorough attention to detail that will serve her well in virtually any position. This is not only something that I observed directly on a day to day basis as her manager, but also in the thoughtfulness of her writing. Stephanie is also proficient at the use of content management systems, and capable of churning out SEO-rich copy as well as highly engaging social media posts. She is an extremely hard worker, capable of adapting to any situation, and a skilled communicator. Her positive attitude, cerebral approach, and grasp of strategy make her an asset to any company.

recommendations.context: Scott worked with Paul but they were at different companies
recommendations.description: I worked with Paul on a series of stories published in GM High-Tech Performance in which Torq installed a supercharger on our C6 Corvette project. Paul was extremely professional and communicated effectively all of the steps involved, and made sure that I had everything I needed to complete the stories. The shop was clean and well stocked, his tech was also professional and thorough, and Paul's tuning was top notch. He also followed up with me on the ride home and after to make sure the car was running properly, and to make any additional adjustments to the calibration. It was a great experience overall, the car made tons of power, and the editorial came out well as the result. Paul's professionalism, attention to detail, and communication are a recipe for success.

headline: Senior Applications Scientist microXRF
about: As an applications scientist, I utilize micro-X-Ray Fluorescence as it relates to nearly any application, industry to academic. Micro-XRF is readily accessible to a broad range of applications and is increasingly used by companies and universities who are new to the technique. My responsibilities are two-fold: to train and educate scientists in XRF fundamentals, and then support them as they apply this technique to specific scientific questions.

headline: Build your social capital and influence ◼ Over 10,000 clients served in 17 years ◼ Co-Host and Founder, Art of Charm
about:
🔥 Command Presence. Real Influence. No Fluff.

Already invested in coaching or leadership programs… but still feel like something’s missing?

You’ve got the credentials. The hard skills. Maybe even the title.

But if your career growth is slowing because your communication hasn’t caught up — you’re not alone.

Most professionals hit a ceiling when soft skills become the differentiator.

And that’s where I step in.

❌ The truth about most coaching:

Leadership courses? Too generic.

Corporate training? Too political.

Communication books and TED Talks? Great in theory, useless in high-stakes rooms.

You need targeted, practical coaching built around your professional world — not some academic framework.

✅ What You’ll Get Working With Me

10 hours. One-on-one. Personalized. Intensely practical.

We’ll work together to:

Decode high-stakes conversations and make your communication hit harder.

Amplify your influence in rooms filled with executives, engineers, investors, or stakeholders.

Build your “X-Factor” — a powerful personal presence that earns trust fast.

Unleash your Social Intelligence — command the room, influence anyone, and forge relationships.

You’ll never watch a video or sit through fluff. This is tactical training designed for results.

💥 Plus: Join the X-Factor Accelerator

An exclusive, implementation-based group for high performers. Inside:

Get real-time feedback from other driven professionals.

Practice frameworks in live drills.

Build executive presence and influence with accountability.

👊 My Credibility
19+ years in influence, leadership, and communication development.

10,000+ clients across tech, finance, military, and consulting.

Coached U.S. Military Special Forces & Intelligence Units.

Host of a podcast with 450M+ downloads featuring world-class scientists and performance experts.

For the Analytic Mind Turned Leader.
For the Founder Now Fundraising.
For the Operator Who Needs Buy-In Fast.

If you’ve already tried “the other stuff” and still aren’t getting the results — let’s fix it.

DM me.

Let's turn communication into your competitive advantage.

recommendations.name: Armando Villa
recommendations.subtitle: SaaS & AI Sales | Driving Growth Across Enterprise & Emerging Accounts
recommendations.description:
I just wanted to share a few words about Armando, who's been with our team for over five years. He's been nothing short of amazing, especially when we hit a rough patch and lost some of our key sales folks.

Armando was the guy who stepped up big time. He didn't just sit back; he got right into the thick of things, helping us rebuild our sales team from the ground up. It's not just about strategies for him; he's all about getting his hands dirty and making things happen.

What I really admire about Armando is his knack for sales. He's got this way of turning complex stuff into plans we can actually work with and make our team better. Plus, he's always pushing us to aim higher, which has led us to smash some of our toughest goals.

But it's not just about the numbers. Armando's a real leader – he's there for the team, offering guidance and support, making everyone around him better.

In short, Armando's a total asset and game-changer. He's made a huge difference in our team, and it's been awesome working with him.

headline: Providing Strategic Financial Leadership for Construction SMBs — Helping Founders Grow with Confidence and Clarity
companyName: GAME Inc - General Contractor | Excavation | Underground
about:
I bring over 15 years of executive financial leadership in the construction industry, with a proven track record of driving strategic growth, operational efficiency, and financial clarity.
From inception through various stages of growth, I’ve helped construction businesses scale sustainably while staying grounded in compliance and sound financial structure.
My leadership style blends analytical precision with a people-first mindset. Whether mentoring cross-functional teams, negotiating complex financing, or building systems that support long-term growth, I focus on empowering founders to lead with confidence and clarity.
I thrive where financial strategy meets operational complexity—and where trust, transparency, and results define success
Ever-committed to building healthy relationships and supporting organizational growth through continuous learning and personal improvement.

experiences.companyName: GAME Inc - General Contractor | Excavation | Underground
experiences.title: Director of Finance
experiences.jobDescription: Oversee Finance and Accounting for growing general contractor, specializing in earthwork, utilities, and general construction.

experiences.title: Vice President
experiences.jobDescription: Work with owners on business development and conduct ongoing financial analysis to promote stability and growth. Support and oversee industrial construction projects for several oil/gas pipeline customers. Develop and implement safety, quality, accounting, and project management processes. Obtain various state contracting licenses for business. Negotiate insurance policies, construction contracts, and short-term capital financing agreements.

experiences.title: Interim Safety Director
experiences.jobDescription: Manage corporate safety program during organizational transition period. Oversee multiple field safety professionals at several fabrication shops in WA and OR, as well as project activities for Shell/Superior Energy Services, Boeing, Georgia Pacific, Proctor & Gamble, Cosmo Specialty Fibers, and others. Assist with roll out of "SafeStart", a behavioral based safety program.

experiences.title: Corporate Safety Manager
experiences.jobDescription: Corporate Safety Manager, responsible for primary oversight and administration of health and safety policies for industrial construction and shop fabrication. Broad range of daily activities including, policy and training development, research, claims management, and general health and safety compliance.
